subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: After a whirlwind start to the week as the new United States Open champion, Justin Rose could have used a rest. Instead, he is playing the next two weekends as he gets ready for the British Open.
snippet: After a whirlwind start to the week as the new United States Open champion, Justin Rose could have used a rest. Instead, he is playing the next two weekends as he gets ready for the British Open.
